title: Monitor files for changes and rerun specified script — monitor
text: dir Character vector. Directory directories monitor changes. Defaults current working directory. file String, file path. Path R script rerun changes detected. ext Character vector. File extensions watch. "*" (default) watches files dir. monitor_hidden Logical. hidden files monitored changes? Default TRUE. Hidden files whose names start dot eg. .Renviron, .env, etc. option especially helpful ext = "*". exclude_files Character vector. Specific files ignore. Changes files trigger script rerun. Default NULL. exclude_patterns Character vector. File name patterns ignore. files dir names matching patterns ignored. Default NULL. exclude_dirs Character vector. Directories exclude monitoring. Default NULL. delay Numeric. Number seconds wait checking file changes. Defaults 1.
